[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': cost data for each supply chain segment in the influencer economy.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'segment', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the supply chain segment to get data for'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'efficiency', 'description': 'the efficiency data for the segment'}, {'name': 'cost', 'description': 'the cost data for the segment'}]}, {'name': 我想了解网红经济的供应链管理。首先，请获取网红经济中的主要供应链环节。然后，获取这些环节的效率和成本数据。接下来，获取网红经济中的供应链风险管理情况。最后，请提供一些关于如何优化供应链管理的建议。

当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是获取网红经济中的主要供应链环节，以便进一步分析这些环节的效率和成本数据。
